articles.title: About this blog
articles.description:
I am Jun Peng, currently in my third year in the School of Computing & Information Systems at Singapore Management University.

Welcome to my personal workspace! The content listed on the blog will mainly be related to Geospatial Analytics, a module I'm currently taking this semester.

articles.title: Take Home Exercise 1
articles.description: Analysing and Visualising Spatio-temporal Patterns of COVID-19 in DKI Jakarta, Indonesia.
